sentences.english: Statistics is a fundamental course as well as one of the kernal courses for Finance and Economics majors.
sentences.chinese: 统计学是财经类专业的基础课和核心课之一。

sentences.english: Heat Transfer is the specialized basic course of Thermal Energy and Power Engineering (TEPE) Specialty.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是热能与动力工程专业的专业基础课。

sentences.english: Single-chip is a basic course, but it is difficult and hard to teach.
sentences.chinese: 单片机是一门基础课，但是它既难学又难教。

sentences.english: Urban Plant Ecology is a branche of plant ecology, dealing with the relation between the plants growing in urban areas and the environment.
sentences.chinese: 园林植物生态学是园林专业的一门专业基础课。

sentences.english: Accounting is an important specialized fundamental course for the non-financial accounting profession compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 会计学是非财会专业必修的重要专业基础课。

sentences.english: Animal breeding is one of the important professional basic courses of animal science.
sentences.chinese: 动物育种学是动物生产学科的重要专业基础课之一。

sentences.english: This course is a basic course of Electromagnetism.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是一门专业基础课。

sentences.english: The education of citizen awareness is the crucial contents of the teaching of the elementary courses of law.
sentences.chinese: 公民意识教育是法律基础课的教学的核心内容。

sentences.english: Dendrology is one foundational course in the Specialty of Forestry.
sentences.chinese: 树木学是林学专业的专业基础课。

sentences.english: The course of Inorganic & Analyze chemistry is foundamental courses of each agriculture major.
sentences.chinese: 无机及分析化学是高等院校农学类各专业的基础课。

sentences.english: The course of analog circuit is a specialized basic course of electrical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 模拟电路是电学工科学生的一门专业技术基础课。

sentences.english: Learn about magic card fanning basics in this free magic lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 了解更多关于魔卡范宁在这个自由魔术视频基础课。

sentences.english: The majority institutions of higher learning previous two years have the public class and the basic course.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的高等院校前两年是开公共课和基础课的。

sentences.english: Medical physics experiment is an important basic course in medical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 医学物理实验是医学院校的一门重要基础课。

sentences.english: In basic law classes, the teacher taught us how to write an administrative statement of claim.
sentences.chinese: 法律基础课上，老师教了我们行政起诉状的写法。
